In England, in the seven days to 11 August, there were 173,256 new confirmed cases (306.4 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 04 August, there were 162,658 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 7% (10,598 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 16 August is 5,498,742 (9,723.7 cases per 100,000 population).
